divs: Sighting DetailsI was preparing me to go asleep when i watch to the sky and... it was over the sky. it was only 19 sec. but we can see about two fire balls like a big white light. One of them drive by itself to one place to another. when they disappear. Anybody believe to me. but....i left this video for you.
Summary: it was suddenly, and i went to take my cellphone to take the video.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Managua
